Author: bumbumboleji
Text: Hi  My teeth are also f’d up from purging (I know EXACTLY what you mean by chipping off)  I don’t have a public dentist..it’s $300 for each chip Just tell the dentist you had /have gastric reflux None of the stigma ..and it basically does the same to teeth  Be strong ..hey at least our teeth are only chipping,right? Sure it’s the front ones and it’s in half but hey still got the stumps!  Always try to look at the bright side

Author: vomitandthrowaway
Text: I'm sorry you're going through all this- and I completely understand and sympathise with binging to cope- but please whatever you do stay off of purging it. Right now, even though it doesn't seem it, your teeth are what you have going for you. 9 months clean- that's great! If you purge, that will be gone, you will be allowing this stress and pain to cause more stress and pain. I know its tempting but you've made it most of a year and I hope you can keep it up.  <3
